metadata.Name: Polyglot-NER
metadata.Description: We introduce Polyglot-NER, a massive multilingual named entity recognition (NER) dataset covering 152 languages. Polyglot-NER is created by distantly supervising Wikipedia articles using a multilingual NER model. The dataset contains 236M named entities, making it the largest publicly available NER dataset. We evaluate several NER models on Polyglot-NER and show that they achieve strong performance. We also demonstrate that Polyglot-NER can be used to improve the performance of NER models on other datasets.
metadata.Paper Title: Polyglot-NER: Massive Multilingual Named Entity Recognition
